name: willdurand/geocoder
description: The almost missing Geocoder PHP 5.3 library.

suggest.kriswallsmith/buzz: Enabling Buzz allows you to use the BuzzHttpAdapter.
suggest.ext-curl: Enabling the curl extension allows you to use CurlHttpAdapter.
suggest.guzzle/guzzle: Enabling Guzzle allows you to use the GuzzleHttpAdapter.
suggest.doctrine/cache: Enabling Cache allows you to cache geocoding results.
suggest.zendframework/zend-http: Enabling Zend Http allows you to use the ZendHttpAdapter.
